ygData.subject: Megatron arrives
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron lands in the clearing of the bunker. Grappler, Aerostreak, Guantix, and Paralysis greet him with pointed and loaded pistols. How can we help you,

Subject: Megatron arrives
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Megatron lands in the clearing of the bunker. Grappler, Aerostreak, 
Guantix, and Paralysis greet him with pointed and loaded pistols.
    "How can we help you, Megatron?" Paralysis croaked.
    He snorted and pushed his way past the foursome. "I have a meeting with 
your Commander...." He said, and then mumbled, "And i have a score to settle 
with two little roaches..."
    He entered the tunnle and proceeded down the corridor looking at the dead 
aliens as he went by. He came to the door and it slid open to reveal Aracnia, 
Tarantulas, Darkmouse, and Quickstrike.
    "Isnt this the picture I always wanted to see. " He said, "Im not here to 
fight, Im here to get rid of these Aliens. Now point me to he nearest 
computer and we can get this over with quickly, " He then looked to 
Darkmouse, "as quick as cracking a spine."
    "Thats enough Megatron! Help us or leave!" Aracnia said as Tarantulas 
laughed himself out of his seat.
    "Im sorry, indeed I am. I will put old grudges aside and do what needs to 
be done."

    (Waspinator isnt in command, Kitkat is, until Megatrons return.)
